author: Jenna Hemsworth
description: Jenna's inspiration: "The inspiration behind The Monarch project was to champion the women of the industry - who too often go overlooked and underappreciated. Trailblazers in their field just like the Bacardi family - in particular, Amalia Moreau who influenced the foundation of the brand - inspired me to create an army of strong women to help spread my message, my cocktail and my legacy."
name: The Monarch

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: Peel of one mandarin orange
